name: My Unlife is Falling Apart
description:
A game created for the 48 hour GMTK Game Jam 2021.

You are Stanley the Zombie. Five minutes before your interview for a job at the Lich's castle, you explode from sheer nervousness! With little time to spare, you need to explore the office dungeon, collect your body parts and resume, and make it on time for the interview.
